name: stitch_images
description: Stitch multiple images together horizontally or vertically with customizable spacing and background color.

image_paths.description: List of paths to input image files (at least 2 images required)

background_color.description: Background color for the stitched image (e.g., 'white', 'black', '#FF0000')

output_path.description: Path for the output image. If not provided, will create stitched version with timestamp
